alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:09PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cuyahoga and northern Lorain Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amherst, or near Elyria, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lorain, Elyria, Vermilion, Westlake, North Ridgeville, Avon Lake, Amherst, Grafton, North Olmsted, Avon, Rocky River, Bay Village, Sheffield Lake, Eaton, Oberlin, Sheffield, Lagrange, South Amherst and Eaton Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
